name: HomegearSerial::read
shortDescription: Reads a single character from a serial device.
description: This method reads one character from a serial device previously opened with HomegearSerial::open().

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: The file pointer resource returned by HomegearSerial::open()

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: The maximum amount of time to wait for data in milliseconds.

returnValue: Returns the read character on success.
